title: Introducing: Sylas
body:
[Aesop](http://aesoplabel.

com/) (SOHN, TALA, Gent Mason, Wayward) continue their hot streak, unveiling new South London duo, **Sylas** and their debut track, _Hollow_. Atmospheric, brooding electronica, it’s beautifully twisted, toeing the line between the foreboding grandeur of Darkside and the minimalism of Mercury Award winning James Blake. As with both of the aforementioned, much of the elegance lies within Sylas’s manipulation of silence, utilising lulls as key moments in the track. Check out Hollow below.
